WorkItem.Description:
Parser breaks when it encounters say <defs><somecrud:foo /></defs> (like inkscape metadata). It won't pop the defs element from the stack, and following elements are parented under defs. 
 
Patch attached (svn diff). Its a bit dodgy, I was in a hurry. Stack now contains nulls for ignored elements.
 
Keep up the good work :)
WorkItem.Summary: FIX: Parsing document incorrectly parents elements when it encounters empty nodes which are in a different namespace

Comments.Message: Fixed in latest checkin. Manged to expand on your fix to a point where unsupported elements are simply ignored and the parser will close parent elements are required.
